title: Vegetarian chestnut roast with mushroom stuffing
ingredients: ['Vegetarian roast', '1 large onion', '1 small eating apple, peeled', '1 stick celery', '50g (2 oz) butter', '3 eggs', '450g (1 lb) unsweetened chestnut puree', 'salt, pepper and nutmeg to taste', 'Stuffing', '2 large onions, chopped', '50g (2 oz) butter', '225g (8 oz) mushrooms', '1 egg', '75g (3 oz) wholemeal breadcrumbs', 'salt, pepper']
